positions.notes: Symmetric starting position. PV = 8 pawns (8) + 2 knights (6) + 2 bishops (6) + 2 rooks (10) + 1 queen (9) = 39. MS = 20 legal moves each.
White has 1 pawn. Kings have mobility but no attacks/defenses. Black king has more mobility (8 squares) than white king (6 squares, blocked by pawn).
White has rook (5 points). Rook has high mobility (14 squares) + king (8 squares) = 22. Black king has 8 squares.

notes: These are baseline expected values for testing metric calculation.
Actual MS values may vary slightly depending on exact legal move generation.
AT and DF values depend on attack/defense detection implementation.
Use these as reference points, not absolute truth - verify with manual calculation.
